overview.en: MBR is a decentralized big data value economic ecosystem based on blockchain technology. Using the digital currency aggregation payment system and financial tools of blockchain technology, it can help users quickly and low-cost free exchange of global currency and large cross-border remittance payment digital currency to become a global payment gateway. MBR is committed to changing the status quo that ordinary users are at the bottom of the biological chain and creating a more just and transparent digital currency payment environment.
overview.zh: 光明行(MBR)是一个基于区块链技术的去中心大数据价值经济生态，利用区块链技术的数字货币聚合支付系统和金融工具，可以帮助用户快捷、低成本的进行全球货币的自由兑换以及大额跨境汇款支付数字货币成为全球支付网关。MBR致力于改变普通用户处于生物链底端的现状打造一个更加公正透明的数字货币支付环境。
